sentences.en: Is there a cut-off point between childhood and adulthood?
sentences.cn: 童年与成年之间有分界线吗？

sentences.en: Few people nowadays are able to maintain friendships into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 现今很少有人能够把友谊维持到成年。

sentences.en: Parents want to know the best way to nurture and raise their child to adulthood.
sentences.cn: 父母们想了解把他们的孩子养育成人的最好方法。
